channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260110)
item.description:
What's New

feat(engine): Improve Vietnamese spelling check and English detection

  • Rewrite checkSpelling() in VNEngine with phonetic-based validation

using consonantTable and endConsonantTable for accurate spell checking

  • Add comprehensive impossible Vietnamese prefix detection with O(1) Set lookup

(impossible2LetterPrefixes, impossible3LetterPrefixes, impossible4LetterPrefixes)

  • Support vAllowConsonantZFWJ setting to properly allow Z, F, W, J consonants
  • Add valid Telex/VNI input pattern recognition (dd, d9, cc, etc.)
  • Handle special Vietnamese cases: "que't" (u after q), "gìn" (i after g)
  • Add more English consonant clusters detection (chr, phr, wh, wr, etc.)
  • Fix mask logic for CONSONANTALLOWMASK and ENDCONSONANTMASK

Build: 20260110

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
